contentrichtext.text: {{italictitle}} {{Taxobox | name = Saurodactylus | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Gekkonidae]] | subfamilia = [[Gekkoninae]] | genus = '''''Saurodactylus''''' }} '''''Saurodactylus''''' is [[genus]] of [[gecko]]s [[endemism|endemic]] to [[Northern Africa]], better known as '''Lizard-fingered Geckos'''. ==Classification of genus ''Saurodactylus''== The genus is listed as containing two species:<ref name="COL">{{cite web|url=http://www.catalogueoflife.org/search_results.php?search_string=Saurodactylus&match_whole_words=on|title=Search results for ''Saurodactylus''|work=2008 Annual checklist|publisher=Catalogue of Life|accessdate=2009-01-27}}</ref> *Banded Lizard-fingered Gecko, ''[[Saurodactylus fasciatus]]'' *Morocco Lizard-fingered Gecko, ''[[Saurodactylus mauritanicus]]'' **''[[Saurodactylus mauritanicus brosseti]]'' **''[[Saurodactylus mauritanicus mauritanicus]]'' ==References== <references/> [[Category:Saurodactylus]]
